leads.lead_text: Petals < 4 mm long, barely exceeding sepals; fertile stamens 4
Petals > 4 mm long, almost twice the length of sepals; fertile stamens 6
Stems sparsely hairy towards base; fruit terminating pedicel
Stems glabrous; fruit on 0.5–4 mm stalk beyond end of pedicel
